pr_title: [lcn] Add action for lcn relay timer

timeline.message:
Added action for lcn relay timer

Signed-off-by: toweosp <toweosp@gmail.com>

timeline.body:
Words in labels should be capitalized. See https://www.openhab.org/docs/developer/bindings/thing-xml.html#formatting-labels-and-descriptions
```suggestion
    @RuleAction(label = "LCN Relay Timer", description = "Start an LCN relay timer")
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Words in labels should be capitalized. See https://www.openhab.org/docs/developer/bindings/thing-xml.html#formatting-labels-and-descriptions

Suggested change
@RuleAction(label = "LCN startRelayTimer", description = "Start an lcn relay timer")
@RuleAction(label = "LCN Relay Timer", description = "Start an LCN relay timer")
timeline.author: fwolter
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -156,6 +156,24 @@ public void sendDynamicText(
         }
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Start an lcn relay timer with the given duration [ms]
+     *
+     * @param relaynumber 1-based number of the relay to use
+     * @param duration duration of the relay timer in milliseconds
+     */
+    @Override
+    @RuleAction(label = "LCN startRelayTimer", description = "Start an lcn relay timer")

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
@ActionInput(name = "relaynumber", required = true, type = "java.lang.Integer", label = "Relay number", description = "The relay number (1-8)") int relayNumber,
@ActionInput(name = "relaynumber", required = true, type = "java.lang.Integer", label = "Relay Number", description = "The relay number (1-8)") int relayNumber,
timeline.author: fwolter
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -156,6 +156,24 @@ public void sendDynamicText(
         }
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Start an lcn relay timer with the given duration [ms]
+     *
+     * @param relaynumber 1-based number of the relay to use
+     * @param duration duration of the relay timer in milliseconds
+     */
+    @Override
+    @RuleAction(label = "LCN startRelayTimer", description = "Start an lcn relay timer")
+    public void startRelayTimer(
+            @ActionInput(name = "relaynumber", required = true, type = "java.lang.Integer", label = "Relay number", description = "The relay number (1-8)") int relayNumber,

timeline.body:
Primitive types should be used where possible.
```suggestion
    private static int convertMsecToLCNTimer(double ms) {
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Primitive types should be used where possible.

Suggested change

private static int convertMsecToLCNTimer(double ms) {
timeline.author: fwolter

timeline.body:
This should be sematically the same:
```suggestion
            lcntimer = (int) (offset + mod * 32);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
This should be sematically the same:

Suggested change
lcntimer = (new Double(offset + (mod * 32))).intValue();
lcntimer = (int) (offset + mod * 32);
timeline.author: fwolter

timeline.body: Bindings should only log to error if something severe happened, like the detection of a bug in the code. You could make this warn.
timeline.bodyText: Bindings should only log to error if something severe happened, like the detection of a bug in the code. You could make this warn.
timeline.bodyHTML: Bindings should only log to error if something severe happened, like the detection of a bug in the code. You could make this warn.
timeline.author: fwolter

replies.bodyText:
@fwolter Thanks for your hints and suggestions. I have changed the log level to warn. Furthermore I corrected upper bound regarding duration in startRelayTimer to 240960 (was 240000).
Hopefully the formatting issues where fixed too.
replies.author: toweosp

timeline.body: I honestly don't know how to handle this from the license perspective. I'll clarify this.

timeline.bodyHTML: I honestly don't know how to handle this from the license perspective. I'll clarify this.

replies.bodyText: I'd say it is ok. The code is not copied from there, but clearly self-written as it is a different programming language - so we don't have any copyright issues here.
replies.author: kaikreuzer
